stories.title: Define Services
stories.description: As an admin, I want to define service types and durations so that customers can book specific appointments.

stories.title: Set Availability
stories.description: As an admin, I want to set available time slots so that bookings are only allowed during open hours.

stories.title: Customer Booking
stories.description: As a customer, I want to book an appointment via an interface so that I can secure a time slot.

stories.title: Prevent Double-Booking
stories.description: As the system, I want to prevent double-booking so that time slots are uniquely allocated.

stories.title: Calendar View
stories.description: As an admin, I want a calendar view of appointments so that I can see daily/weekly schedules.

stories.title: Customer Database
stories.description: As an admin, I want a customer database with history so that I can manage client relationships.

stories.title: Send Reminders
stories.description: As the system, I want to send email/notification reminders so that customers don't miss appointments.

stories.title: Reschedule/Cancel
stories.description: As a customer, I want to reschedule or cancel appointments so that I can manage my bookings.

stories.title: Booking Confirmation
stories.description: As a customer, I want a booking confirmation so that I receive proof of my appointment.

summary: A booking and appointment scheduling system enabling service definition, availability management, customer bookings with double-booking prevention, calendar views, customer database, reminders, and booking modifications.
